properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Warning issued February 5 at 9:17PM EST until February 6 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
* WHAT...Significant lakeshore flooding.

* WHERE...Lucas, Ottawa, Sandusky and Erie Counties.

* WHEN...Until 4 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Numerous roads closed and low lying property
including parking lots, lawns, and homes and businesses will
be inundated near the lake. Some shoreline erosion will occur.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The water level was 70 inches above low
water datum Toledo and 65 inches in Marblehead. The wind is
expected to continue from the northeast at 15 to 25 knots with
higher gusts through Thursday afternoon. Waves of 3 to 5 feet
with occasionally higher waves east of the islands are expected.
The water levels are expected to continue to rise through the
night causing flooding. The water level may not subside Thursday
afternoon and it is possible the flooding could continue into
Thursday night.
properties.instruction:
If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be
closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of
unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone
property. Turn around and find another route to avoid the
flooding.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THURSDAY
